channel.title: How do you set max limit of players on server?
channel.description: Once I first started my server and posted it up I gotten over 50 players in less then 10 minutes. This made the server lag and made my computer move very slow. I heard you can set the max amount of players but i'm not sure how. Can someone help me?

item.title: How do you set max limit of players on server?
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

50 players in 10 minutes, you wish half of them are probably nulls, i would check it out.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set max limit of players on server?

item.title: How do you set max limit of players on server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

playerhandler.java

search for this:

public static final int maxPlayers

and the number after it is how many players u let on

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set max limit of players on server?
